</title>

<traits>

<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

This tincture lets you pinpoint your foes. For the next 5 minutes, your alchemical bomb [Strikes](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) reduce the circumstance bonus to AC your targets gain from [cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=2372).
